dictionary.description: A malicious specter that haunts the world of Ohbanahara. Stories tell us that she once lost a battle with a monstrous beast that attempted to devour children, and that we now see her form corrupted by evil energies. Not only have her appearance and nature changed considerably, but she also retains little of her original personality, causing her to attack any humans she sees now. Even so, witness accounts tell us that she has never attempted to harm a child under any circumstances.
dictionary.evolution:
The time for fun is over.
Everyone, run away.
You'll be sucked in by the power. I wish I could have played more...
dictionary.fusion:
Power...give me more power.
I'll save them next time.
I need power to destroy everything there is!
dictionary.summon:
Urgh... I'm sorry.
I couldn't keep you safe.
All I wanted was to play!

leader skill.desc: 確率で被ダメージの２０％を相手に反射する＆確率で敵のＢＢゲージを少し減少
leader skill.name: 貌魂の禍力
